name: lcd
text:
Enable LCD Display
LCD Type: %1
%2 touch calibration tool
%2 Matchbox-keyboard
Requires Internet connection and forces a reboot.
shortDescription: Enables support for a connected LCD display.
longDescription: Enables support for a connected LCD display. Select the model of the connected LCD display, whether to enable the touch calibration tool, and whether to enable the Matchbox-keyboard. Requires an Internet connection. Forces a reboot for the changes to take effect.
